response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit you. We are offering this remarkable item to you at an exclusive price of $12,000, which is a significant discount compared to its market value of $15,000. This opportunity is not to be missed, as it represents a substantial saving for you while ensuring you receive a top-tier product. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
